From (USANYS) [Contractor]" 
To: "Berman Geoffre USANYS (USANYS)" 
USANYS)" 
(USANYS)" 
(USANYS)" 
Subject: RE: Epstein Trust Analysis 
Date: Thu, 30 Jan 2020 00:07:00 +0000 
Please ignore this version, I will be circulating a revised version with some additional content tomorrow morning. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, January 29, 2020 5:51 PM 
To: Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS)
(USANYS) 
Subject: Epstein Trust Analysis 
Hi everyone, 
(USANYS)
(USANYS) < 
(USANYS) 
I've attached a summary/analysis of the Epstein trust documents we received. This document incorporates the analysis of 
the trusts from 2019 I did previously. 
On the bottom, you'll see each trust has a tab and then further amendments to the trust (if any) go chronologically to the 
right. There's also key and summary tabs at the beginning of the document. 
Please let me know if you have any questions, or if you'd like me to walk you through how to use the document, in case it 
isn't clear. 
Thanks, 
p.s. I wouldn't recommend printing the document, just due to the size of the excel tables. 
EFTA00016812
